name: Let me play, please
description:
Remember the good old times of malfunctioning controllers, stuck buttons, your mother calling you everytime... Ok, not so good, but still fun!

Let Me Play, Please is a run and gun game played with keyboard where you must solve quick point and click problems to keep playing it. Be quick, the old system you are playing in will not wait!
